NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Friends, the forge has asked for another shipment of ore from our mines to be delivered to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern!</color>
2
1
CYCAD: Isn't the construction of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin's</color> protective shell complete? What will this new shipment of ore be used for, Coleus?
3 2
COLEUS: In the construction of the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> my dear apprentice!
4 3
COLEUS: Though it was formed on this planet, the ore we have mined here still requires treatment at the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site</color> on <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> to reach its full capabilities.
5 4
CYCAD: I see! But where on Timber Hearth will the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> be built?
6
5
COLEUS: So far, we have settled on a cave within the planet's underground pools, visited by a wandering quantum shard.
7
6
COLEUS: We will need to put even more eyes into inspecting the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> protective shell before it is sealed completely, to ensure the surrounding groundwater does not seep in!
LV R1 1
Campsite EX2 6
SY R2 6
SY R3 4
